name: DHARMA: THE SWAN
description: Every 108 minutes the button must be pushed. From the moment the alarm sounds you will have four minutes to enter the code into the microcomputer processor touched into the program. When the alarm sounds either you must input the code...
minimum_requirements: İşletim Sistemi: Windows 10, 8, 7, vista, xp İşlemci: Intel Pentium E5300 2.60 GHz Bellek: 512 MB RAM Ekran Kartı: Any Depolama: 100 MB kullanılabilir alan
